Text: Wonderful, I love triviagames ;) Hopefully this one rocks!

If anyone gets problem with starting this like I did, the try to change resolution in the config.ini file.
Under: 

Defaultmode= W1280 H720 F60

try W1024 H768 F70, at least it made my day a bit brighter ;) cheers fellow gamers and thanks Stun for another great game!

A question to all uploaders;

How do you get these games?
Do you actually buy these games and crack them and upload them?
Its a great "Pre-Buy-Test" anyway THANKS!
